Package server

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChargeThread
    The thread used by servers to calculate their charges.
    Proxy
    Proxy is the class that knows every server existing, its use is to help overcharged server by asking to server if there is one that's not overcharged, and then make them communicate.
    Server
    The Server class, used to represent a server on which a client will connect to register and use a service.
    UseThread
    This class is used to take care of a use request and send it to the server.
    WatcherThread
    The class receiving the clients connecting to the server.
